scripts.make-env: mkdir -p build && touch build/.env && echo DISCORD_BOT_TOKEN=$DISCORD_BOT_TOKEN >> build/.env && echo AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID_BOT=$AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID_BOT >> build/.env && echo AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY_BOT=$AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY_BOT >> build/.env && AWS_DEFAULT_REGION_BOT=$AWS_DEFAULT_REGION_BOT >> build/.env
scripts.build: tsc && rollup -c rollup.config.js && cp package.json ./build/package.json && cd build && npm install --only=production
scripts.build-dev-watch: rimraf build && tsc && rollup -c rollup.config.js && cp package.json ./build/package.json && cp .env ./build/.env && cd build && npm install --only=production && tsc -w
